abstract: A longtime deal maker, Ms. Huang was appointed after the two former co-heads of M.&.A. advising for the region left the Wall Street firm.
snippet: A longtime deal maker, Ms. Huang was appointed after the two former co-heads of M.&.A. advising for the region left the Wall Street firm.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley has named Susie Huang head of mergers and acquisitions for the Americas, two weeks after her predecessor announced his plans to leave for Comcast.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Names Susie Huang to Lead Mergers in the Americas

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
